title: Twilight Zone - The Movie [Eng][Dvd - Rip][Multi Subs]
description:
Twilight Zone - The Movie
                      - Multi Subs -

Four horror/science-fiction segments directed by four of Hollywood&#039;s famous 
directors based on TV&#039;s most popular anthology series, bookened by a funny 
and scary prologue and epilogue featuring Dan Aykroyd and Albert Brooks. 

In the first story directed by John Landis (the only one not adapted from 
an original TV episode) a loud-mouthed bigotted businessman (Vic Morrow)
with an intense hatred for Jews, blacks, and Asians, gets the tables turned
on him when he walks out a bar and is inexplicably transported back in time
to being persued by Nazis in 1940s France, then as an African-American at 
a KKK rally in the 1950s Deep South, and as a Vietnamese in 1960s Vietnam.

The second story directed by Stephen Spielberg (a remake of &#039;Kick the Can&#039;) 
an old man (Scatman Crothers) arrives at a retirement home and makes the 
wishes of the residents come true when he magicaly transforms them into 
youthful incarnations of their days gone by. 

The third story directed by Joe Dante (a remake of &#039;It&#039;s a Good Life&#039;) a
young woman on the road (Kathleen Quinlan) gives a ride to a mysterous 
10-year-old boy (Jeremy Licth) to his house and ends up trapped with other 
people in an alternate reality created by the boy&#039;s imagination. 

The fourth story directed by George Miller (a remake of &#039;Nightmare at 20,000 Feet) 
stars John Lithgow as an passenger on an airline whom sees, but cannot convince 
anyone, a mysterious creature on the outside wing of the airplane trying to 
sabotage the aircraft.
